short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to blur out the distracting recommended videos so that you can search for the educational/helpful videos you want

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- A super-simple extension that blocks distractions on YouTube. Don’t get tempted by recommended videos, or even worse: a Youtube shorts rabbit hole. Simply search for the video you want and stay focused.
- If you’re a teacher or a student who is presenting in class and you don’t want to show your home screen or recommended videos, turn this filter on to block it out.
- Site blockers work to completely cut you off from a website. The thing is, YouTube has a wealth of free, high quality content for learning and productivity. This filter will finally enable you to keep the good stuff and block the bad stuff.
- Super simple on/off switch to control filter
- See comments, playlists, sidebar and header (easily find your profile and settings)
